Hi everyone.. I need some help. I setup CARLA on a Google VM and I have tried setting up the scenario_runner as well but I have been met with different challenges. I am able to run the PythonAPI examples of CARLA but not the manual_control.py of scenario_runner. It keeps saying "Waiting for the ego vehicle..." or "Scenario Not Ready". When I also tried running python scenario_runner.py --scenario FollowLeadingVehicle_1 --reloadWorld it returns "Not all tests were successful". I have tried using (same versions for carla and scenario runner) v0.9.8 and 0.9.9. The error I get on my server is "unable to parse the OpenDrive XML string"
